name: Age of Empires II : Rise of the Rajas
summary: Welcome to Age of Empires II HD: The Rise of the Rajas; the third new official expansion for the Age of Empires II universe in over 17 years. Challenge friends with four additional civilizations, new units, technologies, and build your empire on both water and land. Guide history’s greatest heroes in Southeast Asia through four additional campaigns and conquer your foes with mighty hordes of elephants under your command!
info:
• 别名: Age of Empires II (2013): Rise of the Rajas
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RTS
  • 游玩人数: 单人、多人
  • 发行日期: 2016年12月19日
  • 售价: ￥36
